summary: This document appears to be a confidentiality agreement from the Marsh Law Firm, likely related to Epstein case representation. It outlines confidentiality obligations for clients regarding communications with the firm and other clients, and is signed by founding partner James Marsh.

persons.name: James Marsh
persons.context: Signatory of the confidentiality agreement from Marsh Law Firm, establishing client confidentiality terms.

keyFacts: Marsh Law Firm requires clients to keep communications with the firm and other clients confidential.
Confidentiality of group communications depends on all clients in the group maintaining secrecy.
Inadvertent receipt of another client's confidential information does not waive confidentiality rights or privilege.
The document is signed by James Marsh as founding partner of Marsh Law Firm.
